name: Incorrect ZtpMode setting for provisioned devices
description: Certain scenarios can lead to ZtpMode being set to "true" for provisioned devices at various paths in the NetDb

scan.details: Reads the /provisioning/device/ids and /ztpService/status/device/ids paths in the 'cvp' dataset to find devices with ZtpMode set to true where the ParentContainerKey value is not equal to 'undefined_container'

patch.details: Rewrites key values for affected devices in scanned paths to set ZtpMode to false
